description.value:
Frequency once per day

Vitality floods your trammeled soul, offering you rejuvenation, if not quite rest. For each effect that causes the enfeebled or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] conditions to affect you, attempt a Nature check to counteract that effect. The counteract rank of Germination of Resolve is equal to half your level rounded up.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
